### Load the data

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(rvest)
library(geosphere)
load("data/dennys.Rdata")
load("data/lq.Rdata")
```

### Get the distance

```{r}
dist = list()
L = hotels[,c("long","lat")]
for(i in 1:nrow(D)){
  df1 = matrix(rep(c(D[[i,"long"]], D[[i, "lat"]]), nrow(L)), ncol=2, byrow=T)
  df2 = L
  dist[[i]] = distHaversine(df1, df2)
}
```
